front.title: CDNI Request Routing: Footprint and Capabilities Semantics

abstract.t: This document tries to capture the semantics of the "Footprint and Capabilities Advertisment" part of the CDNI Request Routing interface, i.e. the desired meaning and what "Footprint and Capabilities Advertisment" is expected to offer within CDNI. The discussion in this document has the goal to facilitate the choosing of one or more suitable protocols for "Footprint and Capabilities Advertisment" within CDNI Request Routing.
